author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Parma Ham With Pear, Nectarine & Endive recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Parma Ham With Pear, Nectarine & Endive Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2-3 heads chicory, leaves separated and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: First, make the dressing. Put the oil, apple juice, and balsamic vinegar in a jug or small bowl, and whisk together. Season well with salt and black pepper. Arrange the chicory leaves in a single layer on a large serving platter, and drizzle over a little of the dressing.

Core and slice the pears, and halve, stone, and slice the nectarines. Arrange over the chicory leaves with the Parma ham, and toss together gently. Scatter over the almonds, then drizzle with a little more dressing. Season again, if you wish. Serve immediately with some fresh crusty bread.
